item.title: first post
item.description: Hey! Im a 28 year old guy that recently (1 month ago) started learning web development pretty much from scratch except for html/css. While I have previous programming experience, I feel like I have a lot to learn. I’ve been trying out different languages and frameworks and I landed on the MERN stack as my final choice on what to learn. I really enjoy using only javascript and react was more like a flip of a coin after asking around and starting Angular vs React wars.

item.title: welcome
item.description: This my first venture into the world of static site generators! and given the headaches it gave me until I found one that I liked, it might be a while until I go on another adventure. Hopefully this all worked and you can now read the first post on my blog!
